channel.title: How to make a client that other people can connect to
channel.description:
How can I make a client that works, then give it to someone else and they can connect to the server also?
Plus, can someone give me a download of a good pre- made client?

item.title: How to make a client that other people can connect to
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Mott_xX Xx Mott xX
item.description:
@Xx_Mott_xX wrote:

… Don’t know how to even edit a client? EGUI.java, Client.java, enter your i.p address, make sure you have portforwarded, and make ur server online, save n compile after u edit i.p address.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a client that other people can connect to
